abstract: Stocks bounce back from earlier losses, but markets remain murky for investors.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose modestly in midday trading, recovering part of a steep loss from the day before.

headline.main: Markets Retake Positive Ground After a Day of Losses
headline.print_headline: Markets Retake Positive Ground After a Day of Losses

snippet: Stocks rose modestly in midday trading, recovering part of a steep loss from the day before.
